tasks.task_description: Get stack resources to find the EC2 instance
Get instance details and public IP/DNS
Check security group rules for port 8080

description: Check VS Code Server port 8080 accessibility on CloudFormation stack instance
context: Found EC2 instance i-0e49798a9353b7040 with public IP 13.126.114.91. Security group sg-0cfadf903279f4f67 has port 8080 open to 0.0.0.0/0 for VS Code Server.
Successfully tested port 8080 connectivity - received HTTP 200 response. VS Code Server is accessible.
